start.text:
Assalomu alaykum! GoferUz Golang botiga xush kelibsiz üëã

Bu bot Go dasturlash tili bo'yicha ma'lumotlar va resurslarni taqdim etish uchun yaratilgan.

Mavjud buyruqlar ro'yxatini ko'rish uchun /help buyrug'ini yuboring.
O'zbekistondagi Go dasturchilar hamjamiyati haqida ma'lumot olish uchun /group buyrug'ini yuboring.

help.text:
Mavjud komandalar ro'yxati:

	/help - ushbu xabarni qayta ko'rsatish
	/rules - qoidalarni aks ettirish
	/about - ushbu botimizning rivojlantirish qismi
	/group - Go ga oid guruh va hamjamiyatlar
	/roadmap - boshlang'ich o'rganuvchilar uchun
	/useful - Go haqida foydali yoki kerakli ma'lumotlar
	/latest - eng oxirgi reliz haqida qisqacha ma'lumot
	/version - biron anniq reliz haqida to'liq ma'lumot
	/warn - mavzudan chetlashganga ogohlantiruv (faqat adminlar uchun)
help.admin_text:
Admin uchun qo'shimcha buyruqlar:
	/stats - bot foydalanish statistikasini ko'rish

rules.text:
GoferUz hamjamiyati qoidalari:

1. Hurmat bilan munosabatda bo'ling - boshqa a'zolarga nisbatan doimo hurmat va e'tibor ko'rsating
2. Spam yoki reklama tarqatmang - ruxsatsiz reklama materiallarini jo'natmang
3. Siyosiy va diniy mavzulardan chetlaning - guruh faqat Go dasturlash tili uchun
4. Go dasturlash tili bo'yicha savollarda aniq va foydali bo'ling
5. Maqsadimiz - O'zbekistonda Go dasturlash tilini rivojlantirish va Go jamoasini kengaytirish

Qoidalarga rioya qilmaslik ogohlantirishga, takrorlanishi esa guruhdan chetlashtirishga sabab bo'lishi mumkin.

about.text:
Bu bot Go dasturlash tilida yaratilgan va Go dasturlash tiliga bag'ishlangan.
Botning asosiy maqsadi - Go o'rganuvchilar uchun foydali ma'lumotlarni tezkor taqdim etish va
O'zbekistondagi Go hamjamiyatini qo'llab-quvvatlash.

Bot arxitekturasi:
- cmd/bot - asosiy dastur kirish nuqtasi va bot logikasi
- internal/config - konfiguratsiya sozlamalari va muhit o'zgaruvchilari bilan ishlash
- internal/handlers - barcha buyruqlarni qayta ishlash mantiqiy qismi
- pkg/logger - tizimli log yozish uchun maxsus kutubxona

Botning joriy versiyasi: 1.0.0
Muallif: haywan

Bot Golang tilida yozilgan. Go - bu Google tomonidan yaratilgan, yuqori samaradorlikka ega,
statik tipli va kompilyatsiya qilinadigan zamonaviy dasturlash tili.

group.text:
Go dasturlash tili bo'yicha guruhlar va hamjamiyatlar:

üåç O'zbekiston hamjamiyati:
- Telegram: @goferuz - O'zbekistondagi Go dasturchilar guruhi
- Veb-sayt: https://gopher.uz - O'zbekistonlik gopher'lar uchun portal

üåê Xalqaro hamjamiyatlar:
- GitHub: https://github.com/goferuz - O'zbek Go dasturlari repozitoriyalari
- Forum: https://forum.golangbridge.org/ - Go dasturchilar forumi
- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/golang/ - Go haqidagi Reddit jamiyati
- Slack: https://gophers.slack.com/ - Go dasturchilar uchun Slack kanali
- Discord: https://discord.gg/golang - Go dasturchilarning Discord serveri
- Stack Overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/go - Go savollari bazasi

Ushbu hamjamiyatlarga qo'shilish orqali siz Go bo'yicha bilimlaringizni oshirish
va tajribali dasturchilar bilan muloqot qilish imkoniyatiga ega bo'lasiz.

roadmap.text:
Go dasturlash tilini o'rganish uchun yo'l xaritasi:

1. Asoslar:
   - Go sintaksisi va asosiy konstruksiyalar
   - O'zgaruvchilar, tiplar va funksiyalar
   - Strukturalar va interfeys
   - Paketlar va importlar

2. Muhim konsepsiyalar:
   - Gorutinalar va kanallar (Concurrency)
   - Xato qayta ishlash (Error handling)
   - Testing va benchmarking
   - Go tooling (go build, go test, go mod)

3. Amaliy loyihalar:
   - CLI dastur yaratish
   - HTTP server yaratish
   - API yaratish
   - Ma'lumotlar bazasi bilan ishlash

Foydali resurslar:
- Go.dev - https://go.dev/learn/
- A Tour of Go - https://tour.golang.org/
- Go by Example - https://gobyexample.com/
- Effective Go - https://golang.org/doc/effective_go

useful.text:
Go dasturlash tili bo'yicha foydali ma'lumotlar:

üìö Dokumentatsiya:
- Go.dev - https://go.dev/ - Rasmiy Go veb-sayti
- Go standard library - https://pkg.go.dev/std - Standart kutubxona dokumentatsiyasi

üõ†Ô∏è Toollar:
- Go Playground - https://play.golang.org/ - Onlayn Go kodi ishga tushirish muhiti
- GoDoc - https://godoc.org/ - Go kutubxonalari dokumentatsiyasi
- pkg.go.dev - https://pkg.go.dev/ - Go paketlari dokumentatsiyasi

üìñ Kitoblar:
- The Go Programming Language - Alan A. A. Donovan and Brian W. Kernighan
- Go in Action - William Kennedy
- Concurrency in Go - Katherine Cox-Buday

üë®‚Äçüíª Go kodlash uslubi:
- Effective Go - https://golang.org/doc/effective_go
- Go Code Review Comments - https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/CodeReviewComments

üß™ Go bo'yicha mashqlar:
- Exercism.io - https://exercism.io/tracks/go
- Gophercises - https://gophercises.com/
- Go Tour - https://tour.golang.org/

latest.text:
Go 1.21 - Eng so'nggi Go versiyasi

Chiqarilgan sana: Avgust 2023

Asosiy yangiliklar:
- Loop variables tuzilishi yaxshilandi
- Improved workspace (multi-module workspaces)
- Minimal version selection (MVS) algoritmi yangilandi
- Profile-guided optimization (PGO) qo'shildi
- Forward compatibility improvements
- Language changes in slices, for loops va type inference
- Go toolchain qo'shimcha muvofiqlashtirish
- Error handling va logging yaxshilandi
- Asosiy kutubxona yangiliklari qo'shildi
- Testing va benchmarking yaxshilanishi
- Compiler improvements for better performance

To'liq ma'lumot: https://go.dev/doc/go1.21

1.21.text:
Go 1.21 (Avgust 2023):

‚Ä¢ Yangi funksiyalar:
  - clear() builtin function
  - slices package additions
  - log/slog package
  - Rangefunc eksperimental paketi
  - Workspaces improvements
  - Profile-guided optimization (PGO)

‚Ä¢ Sintaksis yangiliklari:
  - Loop variable semantics
  - Type inference improvements
  - Forward compatibility changes

‚Ä¢ Runtime yangiliklari:
  - GC improvements
  - Better CPU utilization
  - Efficient memory usage

‚Ä¢ Standart kutubxona yangiliklari:
  - context package improvements
  - net/http optimizations
  - crypto package additions

‚Ä¢ Tooling yangiliklari:
  - go command improvements
  - debug facilities
  - improved compiler diagnostics

To'liq release ma'lumoti: https://go.dev/doc/go1.21

1.20.text:
Go 1.20 (Fevral 2023):

‚Ä¢ Yangi funksiyalar:
  - Comparable constraint enhancement
  - Improved function calling convention
  - Crypto improvements

‚Ä¢ Sintaksis yangiliklari:
  - Type parameter inference improvement
  - Corner cases in type unification

‚Ä¢ Runtime yangiliklari:
  - Memory allocator improvements
  - Reduced CPU utilization during GC

‚Ä¢ Standart kutubxona yangiliklari:
  - net/http/httptest improvements
  - time package additions
  - bytes and strings functions

‚Ä¢ Tooling yangiliklari:
  - Go workspace improvements
  - Compiler error messages

To'liq release ma'lumoti: https://go.dev/doc/go1.20

1.19.text:
Go 1.19 (Avgust 2022):

‚Ä¢ Yangi funksiyalar:
  - Improved memory model
  - Better atomic operations
  - Language changes in generics implementation

‚Ä¢ Sintaksis yangiliklari:
  - Type inference refinements
  - Behavior of certain edge cases

‚Ä¢ Runtime yangiliklari:
  - Soft memory limit
  - Improved scheduler fairness
  - Minor GC improvements

‚Ä¢ Standart kutubxona yangiliklari:
  - net package enhancements
  - context package improvements
  - New functions in crypto packages

‚Ä¢ Tooling yangiliklari:
  - go command minor improvements
  - Better compile error messages

To'liq release ma'lumoti: https://go.dev/doc/go1.19

default.text:
Kechirasiz, "${version}" versiyasi haqida ma'lumot mavjud emas.

Mavjud versiyalar: 1.19, 1.20, 1.21

Versiya haqida ma'lumot olish uchun /version <versiya raqami> ko'rinishida so'rov yuboring.
Masalan: /version 1.20

warn.error_no_reply: Bu buyruqni ishlatish uchun biror xabarga javob sifatida yuboring.
warn.error_permission: Bu buyruqni faqat adminlar ishlatishi mumkin.
warn.error_status: Foydalanuvchi statusini tekshirishda xatolik yuz berdi.
warn.text:
‚ö†Ô∏è Ogohlantirish ‚ö†Ô∏è

Iltimos, faqat Go dasturlash tiliga oid mavzularda suhbatlashing.
Guruh qoidalariga hurmat bilan yondashing:
- Spam yoki offtopic yuborilmasin
- Faqat Go dasturlash tiliga oid mavzular
- Hurmatli va professional muloqotni saqlang

Qoidabuzarlik takrorlansa, guruhdan chiqarilishi mumkin.

stats.error_permission: Bu buyruqni faqat adminlar ishlatishi mumkin.
stats.error_status: Foydalanuvchi statusini tekshirishda xatolik yuz berdi.
